column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Rhona Beare]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}

column1: *'''Publication:''' Apart from an edited publication in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' as [[Letter 230|letter nos. 230]]
column2: the letter was reproduced in full in ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's Letters to Rhona Beare]]''.
